# Axentra - Rapid MVP Development for Startups

> This file provides information about Axentra, a startup development agency that builds market-ready MVPs in 3-8 weeks.

## Available Documentation

- `/llms-full.txt` - Complete company and service information
- `/llms-medium.txt` - Essential services and portfolio overview  
- `/llms-small.txt` - Brief company summary

## About Axentra

Axentra helps startups and entrepreneurs transform their ideas into market-ready products through rapid development. We specialize in building MVPs that help validate ideas, attract investors, and beat competitors to market.

**Contact:** dlovan@axentra.agency | +46 72 865 2474 | https://axentra.agency
